title: Master Elementalist Lux Edition
body:
The featured section of the shop offers two ways to purchase the new skin:

Elementalist Lux 3250RP
Master Elementalist Lux Edition 3950RP

The master edition includes 10 player icons and the ward skin, however, after selecting the master edition the tooltip says;
1 skin
1 champion
5 icons
1 ward skin

So which is accurate?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=tEPE4i3E,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-29T18:19:30.230+0000)
>
> Hey there! ^-^ 
> 
> **TL;DR**: This is working as intended. 
> 
> You're correct in that you receive 10 icons v. 5. The original 5 icons that you receive with only the skin are considered 'perks' of the skin, which is why they don't include themselves in the bundle (The store knows the bundle to have 5 icons because the other 5 are included in the purchase of the skin). It's the way the store functions. ;_;

https://gyazo.com/0efda69ba35994b6c5d2b31ac79dc83b

And if you get it through hextech the price of the bundle drops to 700 RP
Yup, like all bundles, you'll only pay for the content you don't own, and it'll deduct the RP value of parts of the bundle that you do - in this case, the skin.

hey Riot Katey is there a reason why u guys made it so we can Purchase the master bundle for others? like i wanted to get it for my friend i have the rp on my account But i dont want to have to Gift them another 10$ of rp just to fully get the bundle id rather just finnish it off and save as much rp as i can since i dont make alot of money

Hey yeulx - 

Due to store functionality, bundles aren't able to be gifted. It isn't something that was exclusively turned off for this particular bundle.

I can't seem to be able to buy the Master Elementalist Lux package.  I can see the 3250RP one, but not the better one.  Anyone have an idea of how to get it?  I have 4700RP so I should be able to see it in the Store, but it's not showing up - even with a search.
What happened to the price? was it increased?? because the price for the Master Elemantalist Lux now is 4740 RP

You'll get the 10 icons for sure, as described in the Elementalist Lux FAQ Support article: 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/233073948-Elementalist-Lux-FAQ

Double checking on the tooltip, though!

It should include 10 (though I didn't double-check when I purchased it after noticing the same thing).

I'm guessing that the bundles may have a maximum of 8 items which can be displayed (and the list only includes what is displayed), but it will unlock all 10 when actually purchased.
